title: Special patches/Patches

properties.name: description
properties.value: Cactus patches can grow cactus seeds (55 Farming) and potato cactus seeds (64 Farming).

content:
Contents

  • 1 Special patches
    • 1.1 Special tree patches
    • 1.2 Cactus patches
    • 1.3 Minigame and raids patches

Special patches[edit | edit source]

Level Sapling Location Closest teleport Image
23 Seaweed Underwater
Gardener: Mernia
  • Digsite pendant to Digsite, take the Digsite barge, then travel by rowboat from the Museum camp.
36 Grape Hosidius Vinery
Gardener: Gallow
  • Tithe Farm Grouping teleport (requires 100% Hosidius favour and having entered the minigame area at least once)
  • Xeric's talisman to Xeric's Glade
  • Hosidius house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
53 Mushroom West of Canifis
  • Fairy ring code cks
  • Achievement diary cape teleport to Le-sabrè
  • Salve Graveyard Teleport
  • Kharyrll Teleport
  • Fenkenstrain's Castle Teleport
  • Slayer ring to Morytania Slayer Tower
63 Belladonna Draynor Manor
  • Draynor Manor Teleport
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher
65 Hespori Farming Guild
Gardener: Arno
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Spirit tree if planted in Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west
76 Anima Farming Guild
Gardener: Felfiz Yaryus
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Spirit tree if planted in Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west

Special tree patches[edit | edit source]

Level Sapling Location Closest teleport Image
35/55 Hardwood
Teak and Mahogany 		Fossil Island Mushroom Forest
Gardeners: Squirrels
  • Digsite pendant to Digsite, then take the barge
72 Calquat North of Tai Bwo Wannai
Gardener: Imiago
  • Tai bwo wannai teleport
  • Brimhaven house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Fairy ring code ckr
74 Crystal Prifddinas
Gardener: Pennant
  • Spirit located north-west
  • Teleport crystal to Prifddinas
  • Prifddinas house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
85 Celastrus Farming Guild
Gardener: Taylor
  • Spirit tree if planted in Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west
90 Redwood Farming Guild
Gardener: Alexandra
  • Spirit tree if planted in Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west

Cactus patches[edit | edit source]

Cactus patches can grow cactus seeds (55 Farming) and potato cactus seeds (64 Farming).

Location Closest teleport Image
Al Kharid
Gardener: Ayesha
  • Ring of dueling to Duel Arena
  • Gnome glider to Al Kharid
  • Amulet of glory to Al Kharid
Farming Guild
Gardener: Alan
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Spirit tree if planted in Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west

Minigame and raids patches[edit | edit source]

Type Activity Location Seeds
Tithe patch Tithe Farm Hosidius Golovanova seeds, Bologano seeds and Logavano seeds
Herb patch Chambers of Xeric Mount Quidamortem Golpar seeds, Buchu seeds and Noxifer seeds
